description: This file defines an Angular component named AdminUsersComponent, which displays a list of users with options to view details, and manage user data via UI interactions.

classes.name: AdminUsersComponent
classes.description: Angular component for managing and displaying users in the admin panel.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component and loads user data.

methods.name: onSort
methods.description: Handles sorting of the user list based on selected column.

methods.name: openUser
methods.description: Opens the modal to view detailed information about a selected user.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of users from the AdminService.

methods.name: sort
methods.description: Sorts the users array based on the current sortKey.

ctags.name: User
ctags.pattern: /^    const k = this.sortKey as keyof User;$/

ctags.name: k
ctags.pattern: /^    const k = this.sortKey as keyof User;$/
